attribute.name: project

attribute.name: summary
attribute.value: Initial observations of currents and circulation near the White Point ocean outfalls determine how often coastal ocean processes move the DDT contaminated sediments in this region.

attribute.value: Initial observations of currents and circulation near the White Point ocean outfalls determine how often coastal ocean processes move the DDT contaminated sediments in this region.
